about-1:
I am experienced in scripting and tasks scheduling to provide a better usage of human workforce.
Interested to enlarge my knowlege about DevOps frameworks.
experience-1-description:
Production industrialization and application deployement using scripts within different schedulers.
Technology watch, proof of concept and training peers.
experience-2-description:
Survey and study of Aberdeenshire's public facilities in order to deploy, configure, test and document a unified wireless network within the county.
User support and infrastructure monitoring.
experience-3-description:
Supporting user using business application and retail devices along as monitoring the technical infrastructure.
Scripting tools for my team to work more efficiently everyday.
experience-4-description:
Discovering many differents jobs and positions in various companies from 2-people sized business to worlwide company; public and private; B2B, B2C and laboratory.
Contracts or placements froms 3 weeks to 4 months long in France and UK, learning aspect of team working, client´s relation and work framework.
interests-1: Apart from being an IT scientist, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid snowboarder and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in France, I enjoy mountain hiking, running and kayaking.
interests-2: Wanderlust, I love to travel around the globe to discover new cultures, to find incredible landscapes and learn new things from the people I meet.
interests-3: Magician since my young age, I perform my hobby now as a professional level at local bars and restaurant but also for weddings or other private events.
softskills-1-description: To help people to work together
softskills-2-description: To keep up on a project
softskills-4-description: To help the team to get it done
softskills-5-description: To adapt rapidly in a given-context
softskills-6-description: To discover new ways to do new things
